website_summaries.verdict: While it's an investment, the cutting-edge technology makes it a must-have for those who want to take fishing to the next level.
pros: Sharp image definition with advanced CHIRP and HD sonar that finds fish in the deepest locations
State-of-the-art screen with touch and keypad functions
Not hard to use, but technicians are a call away
cons: Its amazing technology that comes at a high-end price

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: Great unit, but took a few updates for the transducer to not lose bottom. Had a lot of false readings (negative inches in many feet of water), but eventually firmware updates sorted this. My real sticking point is that I can't record sonar logs using my Navionics chip. The hardware is a bit underpowered....takes ages to boot. It also prompts me to send updates (I'm guessing uploading my gps logs) at the worst of times, and I haven't figured out how to disable this.
customer_reviews.author: t3rse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does a beautiful job finding fish and structures on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great unit still getting to know each other but not sure about side scan very hard to read
customer_reviews.author: Joe Builder

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Did not get the transducer for the structure its a 300 dollar transducer it needs
customer_reviews.author: windell griffin

customer_reviews.title: Do your reserch first
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the Lowrance HDS 7. You need to watch a lot of You Tube videos to figure this unit out. Problem Was that Amazon's description does not say that this unit will not do everything they say it will unless you buy a totalscan transducer. Which is $300 more.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, pretty simple, I linked it with my motor guide xi5 how cool it is!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the timely shipping love the unit exactly what it said it was works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: clay wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Came with out the transducer a big missing piece that ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with out the transducer a big missing piece that is need. When purchased the dissciption stated all necessary parts for finder and transducer inculded box came missing the 83/200 transducer.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Lucchesi

customer_reviews.title: Geofence lock
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this device in Amazon from Israel. During the purchasing process I've not received any notification regarding using device in USA only. The device is locked for USA usage only by Geofence lock.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Mikunis

customer_reviews.title: Love this unit
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit. Simple to use yet has a lot of powerful features. Builtin wifi let's me connect my iPad to it to either control the unit from or run my Navionics boating app with sonar chart Live to get real time charting on new body of water. The icing on the cake has to be insight Genesis and its mapping. Incredible detail and once you've mad multiple trips on a lake that you've recorded sonar, merge those trips and create your own Lake charts.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Fishing Good Now
customer_reviews.text: arrived fast and installed easy. works great and will take me a few trips to get a grasp of all the things this thing can do. Love it! It is very clear and precise got it linked up with a Hook 4 and my trolling motor and it is amazing how well they all work together. This was an up grade to my 2004 Lund that was using the original electronics. Funny how they all gave out in the same winter. But can't complain I got thirteen years of use out of them, Amazing! Hope I get half that much out of these new ones. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorsman Extrodinare

customer_reviews.title: HDS-7 Gen 3
customer_reviews.text: Good quality from Lowrance. Met the exact need I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L.

customer_reviews.title: Be carefull, this item cannot be used if u ...
customer_reviews.text: Be carefull ,this item cannot be used if u are going outside USA.
customer_reviews.author: edvinas

customer_reviews.title: This product is really hard to figure out. Hard ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is really hard to figure out. Hard to navigate. Really wish I researched and found a product that was user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Height2214

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super great product I love it for my line of work commercial fishing
customer_reviews.author: Chris k

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to install this on my boat. This thing is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my boat.
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to use it this weekend. Wow. It is very easy to use and it knows everything about Galveston Bay that i need to know.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L Mulkey

customer_reviews.title: the structure scan and three D scan with the Navionics Hot Spot Platinum chip is great.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd unit for my New Boat, the structure scan and three D scan with the Navionics Hot Spot Platinum chip is great.
customer_reviews.author: Extreme X men

customer_reviews.title: ... used it for a few months now and am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for a few months now and am happy with it. It has way more features than I will ever use. Hooking up to my VHF radio was a pain. I had two marine techs give up on it not wanting to damage the unit. After three different wiring hookups given buy Lowrance support the third time was a charm. All works well now and I am happy with the overall usefulness of this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gen3 structure scan
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. The downscan is very deceiving compared to simulation. Simulation is a lot clearer. I think one of the best options is the ability to send wifi to IPAD and see screen and have all the options. I didn't have to by an extra locator for the bow of th boat just used my IPAD instead with a RAM mount. I sure hope some day I receive the $300 mail in rebate that was sent the second week of May .
customer_reviews.author: RyK

customer_reviews.title: Power Issues with PIN connectors
customer_reviews.text: Lowrance has quality issues with their PIN connectors. after some time the pins do not make contact with the female power port. They do not sell the power cable separately only with the transducer. The images are great when the unit works.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hardy

product_meta.title: Lowrance 000-11785-001 HDS-7 GEN3 Insight Fishfinder/Chartplotter with Insight USA and 83/200KHz Transducer
product_meta.description: Lowrance HDS Gen3 w/ 7" Touchscreen and Insight USA Charts. With Built-In CHIRP/Structure Scan Sonar and 83/200KHz Transducer. HDS Gen3 fish finder/chart plotter displays are a revolutionary step forward in product for the marine electronics industry. Technology is not slowing down. Are you keeping up? HDS Gen3 is a bottom machine that goes well beyond finding. HDS Gen3 gives birth to an exclusive new interface that allows you to fully control functions through either multi-touch or full key pad operation depending on user preference and on-the-water conditions. This hi-tech generation advances the award-winning Lowrance target separation by combining simultaneous use of cutting-edge CHIRP sonar technology and our widely-held Structure Scan HD sonar imaging to produce unparalleled views of fish holding near the bottom and around structure. In order to better replicate the underwater home where fish live and how you interact with the display, Lowrance has developed and specially tuned a visibly better screen delivering better definition of sonar returns, dynamic dimensionality in menu elements and a layered, strong and subtle color scheme for striking on-screen detail. To drive the latest in electronics technology the HDS Gen3 benefits the angler by turning out the fastest HDS ever. The advantages of new technology don’t stop there. Total control of trolling-motor, outboard motor and entire electronics system is now achievable in one integrated HDS system. Lowrance Smart Steer allows seamless switching from electric-steer trolling-motor and outboard pilot steering. Add-in any NMEA 2000 certified device, available engine interface cables or Lowrance data sensors for a professional-level system that is effortless-to-install and easy-to-use. Enhancing your time on-the-water, Go Free wireless download and upload of maps, new software and features and cool new fishing apps extends your control into a cloud enabled digital shopping experience.
feature_bullets: Improved interface with touchscreen or keypad option
Built-in Insight USA charts for Coastal and Inland US waters
